name: Sneesa
description:
If you like games that you don't understand the first time you launch them, you have come to the right place!

Hello  There !

Sneesa is game made in 2 days by a team of 7 people during the 2021 Global Game Jam. The theme of the jam was "It doesn't make any sense".

Maybe, we did respect the theme a bit too much... But it was a great technical challenge.

What is the goal of the game ?

You are a ghost trying to find the goal to complete the level. The map is filled with heal packs, robot enemies, collectable bonuses, ammo canister, and buildings.

The character can either, kill with projectiles, dash and eat target or step on a target.

HOWEVER

Each level are different because, every objects listed before can have the property and the behaviour of other objects listed !

So, your goal is to find which action on which object will give you a completion point to finish the level !

But be careful, among those behaviors, some can kill you, so be careful !

We also made a procedural level generation that allows you to play unique level with random objectives and behavioural distribution !

Good luck and Have fun !
